name: A Warrior's Redemption - DEMO
description:
A Warrior's Redemption - DEMO

In this game, you play as a character called "Elio Grande". His goal is to gain his village back as it has been raided by weird creatures.

This is the DEMO of the game which means it is NOT COMPLETED YET. Unfortunately, you won't be able to see the storyline of the game as it has been removed due to an unsolved error.

Have Fun Playing the game!

You are welcome to give me feedback in the comment section, enjoy :)
